casebody.data:
Lamont FIELDS
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 12, 2019

Mark M. Rembish, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Timothy F. Costello, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Lamont Fields' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 188 Conn. App. 902, 202 A.3d 1123 (2019), is denied.
